name: Apartment 1001 [Alpha]
description:
Apartment 1001 - Uncover the Mystery of a Haunted Building!

Join our protagonist on an adventure to solve the mystery of Apartment 1001! This exciting story-driven game will take you on a journey filled with twists and turns as you explore a haunted building and uncover the secrets of its past.

As you progress in the story, you'll encounter a strange phenomenon - the days seem to repeat over and over, like you're trapped in a never-ending time loop. But don't worry, this is where your detective skills come into play. You'll need to gather clues, explore every nook and cranny of the building, and piece together the events leading up to this bizarre situation. The choices you make along the way will impact the future of the story and lead to multiple endings, making every playthrough a unique experience.

Are you ready to take on the challenge and unravel the truth behind Apartment 1001? This exciting and suspenseful journey awaits you - so grab your detective hat and start solving the mystery!

This is the alpha version of the game. It does not have a save game since the full run takes about 10m.
